name: YOU ARE (johan gonzalez)
description:
HELLO, WORLD! HELLO, GAMERS! HELLO, YOU!

THIS IS THE GAME THAT WILL MAKE YOU REMEMBER WHO YOU TRULY ARE!

SIT BACK OR STAND UP AND MAKE THE LEAP INTO THE FUTURE!

NEVER RELEASED BEFORE!

THE ONE AND ONLY  TRUTH ABOUT WHO YOU ARE!

PLAY IT NOW OR LATER!

AND FEEL THE TRUE YOU COME TO THE SURFACE!

GLIMMERING IN THE SUNSHINE!

WET AND MAGNIFICENT!

FINALLY REACHING YOUR TRUE POTENTIAL!

PASSIONATELY AND SENSERELY,

JOHAN

PS: SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW LYRICS XD
